# AVAudioSession.PortOverride.speaker

**Case**

A value that indicates to override the current inputs and outputs, and route audio to the built-in speaker and microphone.

## Declaration

```swift
case speaker
```

## Discussion

This override type is only valid for the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/Category-swift.struct/playAndRecord] category.

## Port Override Types

- **AVAudioSession.PortOverride.none**: A value that indicates not to override the output audio port.

items.description: A value that indicates not to override the output audio port.
